title: iRobot to enter Chapter 11 and be acquired by Chinese creditor
description:
iRobot has begun bankruptcy proceedings under which its Chinese creditors will acquire the consumer robot company and continue the brand.

The post iRobot to enter Chapter 11 and be acquired by Chinese creditor appeared first on The Robot Report.
